Captain Mathias:

The Noble Orcs and Orc Supervia have called a ceasefire. But the Nerva Orcs who decided not to work for Orc Supervia still have a grudge, not just against Noble Orcs, but all other races that entered into a nonaggression treaty.
They've settled in a place we call Raider's Crossroads, and have been threating anyone who comes near them.
